data: {"generalSituation":"A band of clouds will cover the coast of Guangdong in the next couple of days. The weather will be relatively humid with a few rain patches over the region. Under the influence of a strong northeast monsoon, it will be slightly cooler in the morning and brighter during the day over the coast of Guangdong in the middle and latter parts of this week. A replenishment of the monsoon is expected to affect the coastal areas over the weekend.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20260126","week":"Monday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4 to 5.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy with a few rain patches.","forecastMaxtemp":{"value":20,"unit":"C"},"forecastMintemp":{"value":17,"unit":"C"},"forecastMaxrh":{"value":90,"unit":"percent"},"forecastMinrh":{"value":75,"unit":"percent"},"ForecastIcon":62,"PSR":"Low"},{"forecastDate":"20260127","week":"Tuesday","forecastWind":"Northeast force 3 to 4.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy.
